classJeers.wizard: yer spells be weaker than a gnome’s sneeze!
classJeers.fighter: ye're just swingin’ that sword like a toddler!
classJeers.rogue: I've seen kobolds sneak better than ye!

cityResponses.new: Ah, so ye're fresh to the city, eh? Watch out, the rats here are bigger than you!
cityResponses.not_new: Oh, so ye're a regular here? Could’ve fooled me with that face!

classJeers.wizard: I've seen goblin fireworks more powerful than yer spells!
classJeers.fighter: More like a flailer! Ye couldn’t swing yer way out of a tavern brawl!

cityResponses.new: New to the city? Ye’ll be lucky if ye last a week!
cityResponses.not_new: Been here a while, eh? Then why do ye still look so lost?

classJeers.wizard: Yer spells couldn't light a candle, let alone a fireball!
classJeers.fighter: Ye look like ye're fightin' with one arm tied behind yer back!
classJeers.rogue: I could smell ye a mile away!

cityResponses.new: New in town? Ha! Bet ye got lost findin' the entrance!
cityResponses.not_new: Not new, huh? Then stop actin' like a tourist!

classJeers.wizard: My granny casts better spells and she's a goblin!
classJeers.fighter: I've seen better swings from a goblin throwin' mud!
classJeers.rogue: More like a rogue that forgot how to sneak!

cityResponses.new: New, eh? Well, don’t worry, the city’s terrible, ye’ll hate it.
cityResponses.not_new: Oh, ye've been here before? That explains the smell.
